code: @Override public void exceptionCaught(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, Throwable cause) throws Exception {     if (cause instanceof IOException) {         LOG.debug("IO exception (client connection closed ?)", cause).     } else {         LOG.warn("Caught an exception while reading, closing channel.", cause).     }     ctx.close(). }

@Override protected void channelRead0(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, LumberjackMessage msg) throws Exception {     if (process) {         messageProcessor.onMessageReceived(msg.getPayload(), success -> {             if (success) {                 sessionHandler.notifyMessageProcessed(ctx, msg.getSequenceNumber()).             } else {                 ctx.close().                 // Mark that we shouldn't process the next messages that are already decoded and are waiting in netty queues                 process = false.             }         }).     } }
